replace {
  path {
    origin: "openconfig"
  }
  val {
    json_ietf_val:
      "{\n"
      "  \"openconfig-network-instance:network-instances\": {\n"
      "    \"network-instance\": [\n"
      "      {\n"
      "        \"name\": \"DEFAULT\",\n"
      "        \"protocols\": {\n"
      "          \"protocol\": [\n"
      "            {\n"
      "              \"identifier\": \"openconfig-policy-types:BGP\",\n"
      "              \"name\": \"default\",\n"
      "              \"config\": {\n"
      "                \"identifier\": \"openconfig-policy-types:BGP\",\n"
      "                \"name\": \"default\"\n"
      "              },\n"
      "              \"bgp\": {\n"
      "                \"global\": {\n"
      "                  \"config\": {\n"
      "                    \"as\": 65111,\n"
      "                    \"router-id\": \"108.170.235.207\"\n"
      "                  },\n"
      "                  \"route-selection-options\": {\n"
      "                    \"config\": {\n"
      "                      \"always-compare-med\": true,\n"
      "                      \"external-compare-router-id\": true\n"
      "                    }\n"
      "                  },\n"
      "                  \"use-multiple-paths\": {\n"
      "                    \"ebgp\": {\n"
      "                      \"config\": {\n"
      "                        \"allow-multiple-as\": true\n"
      "                      }\n"
      "                    }\n"
      "                  },\n"
      "                  \"afi-safis\": {\n"
      "                    \"afi-safi\": [\n"
      "                      {\n"
      "                        \"afi-safi-name\": \"openconfig-bgp-types:IPV4_UNICAST\",\n"

      "                            },\n"
      "                            \"ipv4-unicast\": {\n"

      "                                  \"prevent-teardown\": false\n"

      "                        }\n"
      "                      },\n"
      "                      \"transport\": {\n"
      "                        \"config\": {\n"

      "                        }\n"

      "                      \"afi-safis\": {\n"
      "                        \"afi-safi\": [\n"

      "                            \"afi-safi-name\": \"openconfig-bgp-types:IPV4_UNICAST\",\n"

      "                                }\n"

      "                },\n"
      "                \"neighbors\": {\n"

      "                    {\n"
      "                      \"neighbor-address\": \"142.251.240.4\",\n"
      "                      \"config\": {\n"
      "                        \"neighbor-address\": \"142.251.240.4\",\n"

      "              }\n"
      "            }\n"

      "    ]\n"
      "  }\n"
      "}"
  }
}
update {
  path {
    origin: "cli"
  }
  val {
    ascii_val:
      "hostname cx02.dia02\n"
      "grpc\n"
      " dscp cs4\n"
      " max-streams 128\n"
      " max-streams-per-user 128\n"
      " address-family dual\n"
      " max-request-total 256\n"
      " max-request-per-user 32\n"
      "!\n"
      "vrf MGMT\n"
      " description Management VRF\n"
      " ! $Id: //depot/google3/configs/production/network/inet/configlets/PROD/IOSXR/BASE/management_vrf.conf#1 $\n"
      " !description Management VRF\n"
      " address-family ipv4 unicast\n"
      " !\n"
      "!\n"
      "address-family ipv4 unicast\n"
      "!\n"
      "address-family ipv6 unicast\n"
      "!\n"
      "ntp\n"
      " server 216.239.35.0\n"
      " server 216.239.35.4\n"
      " server 216.239.35.8\n"
      " server 216.239.35.12\n"
      " access-group ipv4 serve-only ipv4-ntp-servers\n"
      " source Loopback0\n"
      " update-calendar\n"
      "!\n"
      "system recovery\n"
      "call-home\n"
      " service active\n"
      " contact smart-licensing\n"
      " profile CiscoTAC-1\n"
      "  active\n"
      "  destination transport-method email disable\n"
      "  destination transport-method http\n"
      " !\n"
      "!\n"
      "!\n"
      "prefix-set ipv4-link-local\n"
      "  169.254.0.0/16 le 32\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "prefix-set ipv6-link-local\n"
      "  fe80::/10 le 128\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "prefix-set ipv4-default-only\n"
      "  0.0.0.0/0\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "prefix-set ipv6-default-only\n"
      "  ::/0\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set BRIDGEGATE\n"
      "  65532:10619\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set NO-ADVERTISE\n"
      "  no-advertise\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set ROUTE-INJECTOR\n"
      "  65532:10600\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set SHELLFISH-DECAP\n"
      "  65532:10640\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set AS15169.ESPRESSO-EFV\n"
      "  65532:10613\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set REGIONAL-CLOUD-ANYCAST\n"
      "  65532:10665\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set AS15169.SUPER-AGGREGATES\n"
      "  65532:10612\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set AS15169.SR-TE-ANYCAST-SID\n"
      "  65532:10691\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "community-set AS15169.ESPRESSO-NHER-NETSLO\n"
      "  65532:10689\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy METRO-PR\n"
      "  if destination in ipv4-link-local then\n"
      "    drop\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if destination in ipv6-link-local then\n"
      "    drop\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if community matches-every AS15169.SUPER-AGGREGATES then\n"
      "    drop\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if community matches-every AS15169.SR-TE-ANYCAST-SID then\n"
      "    drop\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  set local-preference 100\n"
      "  done\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy PASS-ALL\n"
      "  # $Id: //depot/google3/configs/production/network/inet/configlets/PROD/IOSXR/BGP/common_route_policies.conf#4 $\n"
      "  done\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy CX-PR-OUT\n"
      "  if community matches-every BRIDGEGATE then\n"
      "    drop\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if community matches-every AS15169.ESPRESSO-EFV then\n"
      "    drop\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if community matches-every AS15169.ESPRESSO-NHER-NETSLO then\n"
      "    drop  \n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  done\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy NO-ROUTES\n"
      "  drop\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy SATELLITE\n"
      "  if community matches-every SHELLFISH-DECAP then\n"
      "    set community NO-ADVERTISE additive\n"
      "    done\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if destination in ipv4-default-only then\n"
      "    done\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if destination in ipv6-default-only then\n"
      "    done\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  if community matches-every ROUTE-INJECTOR then\n"
      "    set community NO-ADVERTISE additive\n"
      "    done\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  drop\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy CX-SATELLITE-IN\n"
      "  pass\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy CX-MINICLUSTER-IN\n"
      "  if community matches-every REGIONAL-CLOUD-ANYCAST then\n"
      "    set local-preference 10500\n"
      "    done\n"
      "  endif\n"
      "  set local-preference 100\n"
      "  done\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "router static\n"
      " vrf MGMT\n"
      "  address-family ipv4 unicast\n"
      "   0.0.0.0/0 10.225.251.1\n"
      "  !\n"
      " !\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy DIRECT\n"
      "if destination in ipv4-link-local then\n"
      "drop\n"
      "endif\n"
      "if destination in ipv6-link-local then\n"
      "drop\n"
      "endif\n"
      "if destination in ipv4-direct-routes then\n"
      "set community AS15169.CONNECTED\n"
      "done\n"
      "endif\n"
      "if destination in ipv6-direct-routes then\n"
      "set community AS15169.CONNECTED\n"
      "done\n"
      "endif\n"
      "drop\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "route-policy NHER-IN\n"
      "drop\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "prefix-set ipv4-link-local\n"
      "169.254.0.0/16 le 32\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "prefix-set ipv6-link-local\n"
      "fe80::/10 le 128\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "prefix-set ipv4-direct-routes\n"
      "0.0.0.0/0 ge 20 le 32\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "prefix-set ipv6-direct-routes\n"
      "::/0 ge 64 le 128\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "community-set AS15169.CONNECTED\n"
      "  65532:10200\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "route-policy STATIC-TO-BGP\n"
      "if tag is 655321010 or tag is 655321011 then\n"
      "set local-preference 10000\n"
      "set community AS15169.STATIC-INTERNAL additive\n"
      "set origin igp\n"
      "done\n"
      "endif\n"
      "if tag is 655321012 and destination in MIDDLESLEDGE-RANGE then\n"
      "set local-preference 10000\n"
      "set community MIDDLESLEDGE-DECAP additive\n"
      "set community AS15169.CONNECTED additive\n"
      "set origin igp\n"
      "done\n"
      "endif\n"
      "if tag is 655321013 and destination in MIDDLESLEDGE-RANGE then\n"
      "set local-preference 10000\n"
      "set community AS15169.CONNECTED additive\n"
      "set community AS15169.METRO-LOCAL additive\n"
      "set origin igp\n"
      "done\n"
      "endif\n"
      "if tag is 655321015 and destination in ARIADNE-DECAP-RANGE then\n"
      "set local-preference 10000\n"
      "set community AS15169.STATIC-INTERNAL additive\n"
      "set origin igp\n"
      "done\n"
      "endif\n"
      "drop\n"
      "end-policy\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "community-set AS15169.STATIC-INTERNAL\n"
      "  65532:10100,\n"
      "  65532:10210\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "prefix-set MIDDLESLEDGE-RANGE\n"
      "10.141.192.0/20 le 27,\n"
      "10.141.208.0/20 le 27\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "community-set MIDDLESLEDGE-DECAP\n"
      "  65532:10641\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "community-set AS15169.CONNECTED\n"
      "  65532:10200\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "community-set AS15169.METRO-LOCAL\n"
      "  65534:60010\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "\n"
      "prefix-set ARIADNE-DECAP-RANGE\n"
      "10.61.104.0/24 ge 30\n"
      "end-set\n"
      "!\n"
      "ssh server dscp 32\n"
      "ssh timeout 120\n"
      "ssh server rate-limit 600\n"
      "ssh server rekey-volume 4095\n"
      "ssh server session-limit 64\n"
      "ssh server v2\n"
      "ssh server vrf MGMT\n"
      "ssh server vrf default\n"
      "end"
  }
}
